1.verse: Rejoice in the LORD, O ye righteous: for praise is comely for the upright.

2.verse: Praise the LORD with harp: sing unto him with the psaltery and an instrument of ten strings.

3.verse: Sing unto him a new song; play skilfully with a loud noise.

4.verse: For the word of the LORD is right; and all his works are done in truth.

5.verse: He loveth righteousness and judgment: the earth is full of the goodness of the LORD.

6.verse: By the word of the LORD were the heavens made; and all the host of them by the breath of his mouth.

7.verse: He gathereth the waters of the sea together as an heap: he layeth up the depth in storehouses.

8.verse: Let all the earth fear the LORD: let all the inhabitants of the world stand in awe of him.

9.verse: For he spake, and it was done; he commanded, and it stood fast.

10.verse: The LORD bringeth the counsel of the heathen to nought: he maketh the devices of the people of none effect.

11.verse: The counsel of the LORD standeth for ever, the thoughts of his heart to all generations.

12.verse: Blessed is the nation whose God is the LORD; and the people whom he hath chosen for his own inheritance.

13.verse: The LORD looketh from heaven; he beholdeth all the sons of men.

14.verse: From the place of his habitation he looketh upon all the inhabitants of the earth.

15.verse: He fashioneth their hearts alike; he considereth all their works.

16.verse: There is no king saved by the multitude of an host: a mighty man is not delivered by much strength.

17.verse: An horse is a vain thing for safety: neither shall he deliver any by his great strength.

18.verse: Behold, the eye of the LORD is upon them that fear him, upon them that hope in his mercy;

19.verse: To deliver their soul from death, and to keep them alive in famine.

20.verse: Our soul waiteth for the LORD: he is our help and our shield.

21.verse: For our heart shall rejoice in him, because we have trusted in his holy name.

22.verse: Let thy mercy, O LORD, be upon us, according as we hope in thee.
